scroll right
 
My Story
          by Haowei
I.
Borned and raised in China, I spent most of my time exploring the world, enjoying my life, and challenging myself.
II.
Everything changed when I was seventeen, I moved to the United States. Nothing was prepared, nor my mental.
III.
I spoke no English, nor poccessed the skills for me to survive.
IV.
Study, study, and study, that's how my high school here was. Fear of not being able to adapt to the society I was in, I pushed myself beyong my limit. From no English to full ride at Boston University, I made it.
V.
Soon in college, I realized the subjects we are taught are not decided by us, and the textbooks we read are far outdated. Study is not enough, I said, actions and creativity are the keys. That is when I devoted all of my time learning by myself and learning from myself.
VI.
If I am going to summarize my life, it is going to be nine parts, hereby, I name this project square9, meaning nine parts. Square9 means 3, and that's how everyone life is: birth, process, and death.
